xwikidoc.name: SourcesSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('Sources.Code.SourcesClass')) (% class="xform" %) ((( ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Sources.Code.SourcesClass_0_name"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('name', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('name') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Sources.Code.SourcesClass_0_url"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('url', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('url') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Sources.Code.SourcesClass_0_startDate"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('startDate', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('startDate') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Sources.Code.SourcesClass_0_endDate"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('endDate', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('endDate') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Sources.Code.SourcesClass_0_competition"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('competition', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('competition') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Sources.Code.SourcesClass_0_sport"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('sport', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('sport') ; <label#if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') for="Sources.Code.SourcesClass_0_lastFetchDate"#end>$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('lastFetchDate', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('lastFetchDate') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
